hero_title: AI-Powered Assistant to Turn Your Ideas into Startups
hero_subtitle: From idea to complete business plan, with step-by-step guidance and advanced AI
feature1_desc: Smart guidance at every stage of your startup journey
feature2_desc: From idea definition to investor pitch preparation
feature3_desc: Share and collaborate on projects with your team
feature4_desc: Get business plan and pitch deck in various formats
testimonial1_text: This platform truly transformed my startup journey. The AI helped me create a professional business plan.
testimonial2_text: Step-by-step guidance and excellent support. I couldn't have turned my idea into a product without this platform.
testimonial3_text: The 8 comprehensive phases were incredibly helpful. Now I can confidently pitch to investors.
faq_a1: Simply click "Start Free" and create your account. Then you can begin your first startup project.
faq_a2: Yes! Our AI is trained on the best entrepreneurial experiences and provides practical guidance at every stage.
faq_q3: Can I share my projects with my team?
faq_a3: Yes! Depending on your chosen plan, you can share projects with different numbers of team members.
faq_q4: What formats are available for final output?
faq_a4: You can get your business plan and pitch deck in PDF, Word, and Excel formats.
